word: H2199 - זָעַק - zâʻaq - zaw-ak' - Assemble - கூடுக

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - முறையிடு, அழு, கூப்பிடு, கூக்குரலிடு, வேண்டிக்கொள், அலறு. கதறு. அபயமிடு, ஒலமிடு, வரவழை, புலம்பல், உண்டாகு, கூட்டங்கூடு, அழை, நிர்ணயம்பண்ணு
to cry, to cry out, to call, to call for help
2) to cry, to cry out (in need)
b) (Niphal) to be assembled, to be called together, to be joined together
1) to call, to call out, to call together, to summon
2) to make a crying, to proclaim
4) to call out to, to call out at

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to shriek (from anguish or danger); by analogy (as a herald) to announce or convene publicly: - assemble, call (together), (make a) cry (out), come with such a company, gather (together), cause to be proclaimed.
Cognate: H2199, H2201
